IAnswer - Interface in com.peterlyons.smartears
This interface represents an answer that can be played and which the user must identify or otherwise answer
IAnswerManager - Interface in com.peterlyons.smartears
This interface is responsible for managing a user-alterable set of answers.
IAnswerSelectionStrategy - Interface in com.peterlyons.smartears
This interface represents a class that is a particular way of choosing the next answer from a set of possible answers.
IController - Interface in com.peterlyons.smartears
This is the interface that is used to provide access to the main objects in the system and to connect the GUI classes to the classes that model the sysetm.

Handles the registering, unregistering, and notifying of ExampleListeners
IExampleManager - Interface in com.peterlyons.smartears
The IExampleManager is responsible for controlling the example related operations of the system
IExercise - Interface in com.peterlyons.smartears
This interface represents a collection of IAnswers that constitute a set of related structures to be learned together
IExerciseEventManager - Interface in com.peterlyons.smartears.event
Classes implementing this interface will handle registering, unregistering, and propogating ExerciseEvents to ExerciseListeners
IExerciseManager - Interface in com.peterlyons.smartears
This interface is responsible for handling exercise level events for this system, such as changing to a different exercise
